name: Project Hedgefrog
description:
"He's a cool lil' amphibian with an attitude.

Sounds familiar? That's impossible. Running fast? Nah- Jumping high! 

Horizontal? Nah- Think vertical - the sky is the limit! ( or not ; ) )

Never before was there a Hedgefrog, that jumps higher than the heights of clouds with the super original catch-phrase " 'Gotta jump high!".

Long story short; it's Johnny the Hedgefrog - and he's the highest thing alive! "



Hi we're a collaborating 2 人 dev-team, and we're super happy to present you our little title. It would be great if you can check it out and leave us some feedback.
The game's origin was basically an inside - joke / parody (obviously inspired by things from the 90es + modern platform games) - gone too far and turned into this little  project. 
This app only has one level and~  is supposed to be challenging.
Part frustrating, but also part fun - as you get a hang of the gameplay, the game's features and become more and more familiar with the map-layout.
Eventually, you can try the timer-mode  and see how long it takes YOU to reach the top. What's your favourite leap? 

Feel free to play the game on your mobile device, to experience it as intended.
Thank you for trying this beta version.
